priorVersion.title: CDISC Clinical Classification Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status ECOG101 Standardized Character Response Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C179944

self.title: CDISC Clinical Classification Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status ECOG101 Standardized Character Response Terminology

definition: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status standardized character result for ECOG101 test and test code.
name: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status Clinical Classification STRESC for ECOG101 TN/TC
preferredTerm: CDISC Clinical Classification Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status ECOG101 Standardized Character Response Terminology
synonyms: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status Clinical Classification STRESC for ECOG101 TN/TC

terms.definition: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status standardized character result for ECOG101-Fully active, able to carry on all pre-disease performance without restriction.
terms.preferredTerm: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status ECOG101 Standardized Character Result 0

terms.definition: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status standardized character result for ECOG101-Restricted in physically strenuous activity but ambulatory and able to carry out work of a light or sedentary nature, e.g., light house work, office work.
terms.preferredTerm: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status ECOG101 Standardized Character Result 1

terms.definition: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status standardized character result for ECOG101-Ambulatory and capable of all selfcare but unable to carry out any work activities. Up and about more than 50% of waking hours.
terms.preferredTerm: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status ECOG101 Standardized Character Result 2

terms.definition: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status standardized character result for ECOG101-Capable of only limited selfcare, confined to bed or chair more than 50% of waking hours.
terms.preferredTerm: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status ECOG101 Standardized Character Result 3

terms.definition: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status standardized character result for ECOG101-Completely disabled. Cannot carry on any selfcare. Totally confined to bed or chair.
terms.preferredTerm: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status ECOG101 Standardized Character Result 4

terms.definition: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status standardized character result for ECOG101-Dead.
terms.preferredTerm: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status ECOG101 Standardized Character Result 5
